data.message: Facebook has brought people into my life otherwise I would have never met, although only virtually with most. FB has reunited me with others where distance had separated us. FB allows people a place to educate others on what's going on in the world. FB allows us to remember those who have passed. FB gives us the opportunity to encourage each other or make someone laugh. FB has given many of us who are disabled & cannot get out to socialize some sort of a social life. FB gives an opportunity to share real time happenings...the live feed was offered at a most important time, allowing people worldwide to join together to save Mother Earth & show love to one another. This video was beautifully done, thank you FB for all you do.

replies.message: We're flattered, Melanie. We appreciate your kind words and we're glad you're part of our community. <3 -Jessica
Incredibly well said Melanie Williams, I pray that next year all that Facebook will have share are all happy, loving and beautiful things that wil happen in 2017.
I don't have a video either, oh well!!
Pat Chrapliwy thank you...wonderful prayer, I agree with you. 💞
